# Container Types

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/container-types-in-verse
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:49:28.036697

---

Store multiple values together by using a container type. Verse has a number of container types to store values in.

[![Option](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/159c5a63-b0f5-4d6f-9c4b-2e035dc63d71?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Option

The option type can contain one value or can be empty.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/option-in-verse)[![Range](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/2da04b90-492e-418b-b002-055a256ee97c?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Range

The range expression contains all the numbers in a specified range, and can only be used in specific expressions.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/range-in-verse)[![Array](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/41e9a58c-e83f-4c9e-9f12-97e16ae2a394?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Array

An array is a container where you can store elements of the same type, and access the elements by their position in the array.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/array-in-verse)[![Map](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/2133afd5-d511-4f0e-a15d-eb0fc104408c?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Map

A map is a container where you can store values associated with other values, called key-value pairs, and access the elements by their unique keys.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/map-in-verse)[![Tuple](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/0324ccc7-2149-4785-b088-c252a12ddf2e?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Tuple

A tuple is a container where you can group two or more expressions of mixed types and access the elements in the tuple by their position.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/tuple-in-verse)
